game_loop_mechanics: If Player selects Unit -> Highlight valid MOVE tiles and ATTACK targets. If Player drags Unit to empty valid Tile -> Unit performs MOVE. If Player drags Unit to valid Enemy Unit Tile -> Unit performs ATTACK, DESTROY Enemy Unit, Unit performs MOVE to that Tile. Objective: Checkmate the opposing King.
background_theme: Sprawling Neon Megalopolis with flying vehicles, skyscraper vistas, and dynamic weather effects like 'synth-rain'.
obstacles: Data Spikes (Impassable tiles, randomly generated or mission-specific)
Energy Field (Slows movement of units entering for one turn)
Holographic Billboard (Provides temporary cover, blocking ranged attacks for a turn)
rules_summary: A turn-based strategy game adapting classic chess rules to a dynamic cyberpunk setting. Players command a team of futuristic units, each with unique abilities based on their traditional chess counterparts, moving and attacking across an 8x8 holographic grid to achieve checkmate against the enemy King.
ui_elements: Unit Info Panel (Shows unit stats, movement range, attack potential)
